risks: Reliance on blockchain adoption in a traditional industry
High legal and regulatory compliance costs (page 14)
Competition from established direct and indirect players (page 11)
Marketplace beta testing and development risks (page 10)
Uncertainty of achieving the Serviceable Obtainable Market (SOM) of 1-3 Billion (page 12)
one_liner: Bringing blockchain into every sphere of life, starting with real estate.
strengths: Experienced team with Fintech and Blockchain knowledge (pages 2, 3)
Addresses slow, bureaucratic real estate processes (page 4)
Solution offers secure, efficient, and transparent property ownership (page 5)
Competitive advantages: transparency, limited intermediaries, cost reduction (page 9)
Large target market including individuals and real estate companies (page 7)
Clear business model with multiple revenue streams (page 13)
